name: Miley Cyrus Haters
description:
Here our fisrt MCHaters' version !

Choose your mode;
"Friendly mode" or "Brutal mode",
And use your fingers to avoid or kill Miley.
Hate you or love you Miley ?
MCHater, this arcade game is for you !

More Games --> Funigamer

Play the new prototype of MCHaters here : MCHaters 3.0
